content:
# Essential Cardano360 September 2024 Edition

![](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

We’re back from our summer break! Welcome to Essential Cardano360 September 2024 edition! 👋

🔍This month we’ve a bumper edition with all the latest updates from the Cardano ecosystem and our news from over the summer. We’ve also got Constitutional Workshops, news from member-based organization Intersect, and the Cardano Budget. Plus, guest slots from the teams at Iagon, Project Catalyst, COTI and RealFi.

We’ve also got news from Project Catalyst’s visit to Japan and all the latest as it gears up for Fund13, driving community-driven innovation forward.

🐦For real-time updates, [follow IO on X](https://x.com/InputOutputHK).

🗒️If you want to be part of the Cardano ecosystem and help develop Cardano and IO products, [check the IO Careers page](https://iohk.link/3TlsMgH).

Want to be considered for inclusion in the show? [Apply here](https://landing.essentialcardano.io/360-project-details).

## 💻 Useful Links:

🔗[Get involved with Project Catalyst Fund13](https://projectcatalyst.io/funds/13).

[Check out the Project Catalyst Horizons report](https://projectcatalyst.io/reports/horizons.pdf).

[Review the Japan spotlight report here](https://projectcatalyst.io/reports/japan.pdf).

[Join Project Catalyst regular Town Hall meetings](https://bit.ly/catalyst-townhall).

[Subscribe to the Project Catalyst newsletter](https://bit.ly/ProjCatNews).

🔗[Learn more about the RealFi project](https://realfi.co/).

🔗[Stay up to date with news about Djed](https://djed.xyz/).

🔗[Become a part of the Intersect members-based organization](https://www.intersectmbo.org/).

[Find & join the nearest Intersect constitutional workshop](https://lu.ma/constitution).

[Intersect discord](https://discord.gg/GC77PnRp)

[Budget committee knowledge base](https://docs.intersectmbo.org/intersect-overview/intersect-committees/budget-committee)

## 🔗Building On Cardano:

[Iagon](https://iagon.com/)

[Watch the full interview](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3NabSR2lJi4).

We encourage you to actively participate in the creation and moderation of our content—your contributions are invaluable. All content is reviewed by another community member.
